scripts.s3syncAll: aws s3 sync ~/Downloads/archive/ s3://tsvetta/archive/ --endpoint-url=https://s3.us-west-004.backblazeb2.com --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --exclude='*.DS_Store'
scripts.s3syncAllAndDeleteIfNotLocal: aws s3 sync ~/Downloads/archive/ s3://tsvetta/archive/ --endpoint-url=https://s3.us-west-004.backblazeb2.com --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --exclude='*.DS_Store' --delete --dryrun
scripts.s3LastFile: aws s3 ls s3://tsvetta/archive/ --recursive --endpoint-url=https://s3.us-west-004.backblazeb2.com | sort | tail -n 1
scripts.s3addCacheHeader: aws s3 cp s3://tsvetta/archive/ s3://tsvetta/archive/ --endpoint-url=https://s3.us-west-004.backblazeb2.com --recursive --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable'
